summary: The Augustine Interfaith Order of Hellbound Saints, a team of blasphemous ministers who live in a constant state of debauchery, work to drag the worst of demons back to Hell.
cast: Clifton Collins Jr.|Clancy Brown|Andre Royo|Robyn Rikoon|Macon Blair|Stephen Gevedon|Larry Fessenden|Dan Fogler|Aaron Auslender|Edoardo Ballerini|Larry Block|Patricia Bruno|Samantha Buck|Dan Chen|Nadim Choudhary|Ronald De Suze|Brian Donahue|Lauren Francesca|Diana Fuller|Corey Gegner|Caryll Gordon|Michelle Hill|Keith Johnson|Jaiden Kaine|Jacqueline Knapp|Carole Langan|Justin Little|Lisa-Marie Long|Giovanna Maimone|Raymond Mamrak|Roberto Monticello|Folake Olowofoyeku|Clementine Jane Petty|Lorrainne Petty|Hugh Potts|Chris Powell|Donna Ross|George Schram|John Shim|Rico Simonini|Christopher Slade|James Slattery|Sophie Vanier|Jeff Ware
keywords: 3 dimensional|black comedy|based on graphic novel|based on comic book|based on comic
title: Hellbenders
